sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MultisourceDataCleanup</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Get the records to be deleted from cmdb_multisource_data using cmdb_multisource_deny_class</description>
        <name>MultisourceDataCleanup</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MultisourceDataCleanup = Class.create();
MultisourceDataCleanup.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getDenyClassesForCleanup: function() {
        var denyClassesMap = {};
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_multisource_deny_class');
		gr.addActiveQuery();
		gr.query();
		while (gr.next()) {
			var parentClassName = gr.getValue('class');
			var ext = GlideDBObjectManager.get().getAllExtensions(parentClassName);
			for (var x = 0; x < ext.size(); ++x) {
				var className = ext.get(x) + "";
				if(!denyClassesMap[className])
					denyClassesMap[className] = true;
			}  
		}
		return Object.keys(denyClassesMap);
    },

    type: 'MultisourceDataCleanup'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-12 22:18:11</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>78e4c71253f1311004adddeeff7b12fd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MultisourceDataCleanup</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_78e4c71253f1311004adddeeff7b12fd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-19 19:12:23</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
